video.title: Love It or List It Collection
video.synopsis: When their houses no longer fit their lifestyles, homeowners look to a realtor and a designer to help them decide whether to sell or stay put.

seasons.title: Love It or List It: Collection 1

episodes.synopsis: House woes are dividing a couple with a day-care business. Can Hilary create a kid-friendly space or will David tempt them to move on?
episodes.title: Daddy Daycare

episodes.synopsis: Paul and Kate found the perfect fixer-upper, but after triplets, another child and a dog, their house is stretched to its limits.
episodes.title: Solitary Bathroom for Six

episodes.synopsis: A run-down kitchen and an ugly basement are just two of their problems. Will they choose to refurbish or just say goodbye to their "unwanted guests?"
episodes.title: Uninvited Visitors

episodes.synopsis: No longer in love with their unsafe home, Rob and Laura will either embrace a major redesign or kiss their laborious living situation goodbye.
episodes.title: Hazardous Household

episodes.synopsis: Unlike most homeowners, these recent empty nesters have too much space. Help is at hand, but who will they listen to: the designer or the realtor?
episodes.title: Ready for Retirement

episodes.synopsis: Designer Hilary is sure a facelift will solve a conflicted couple's space dilemma. Realtor David thinks they need a new house. Either way, they win.
episodes.title: Double Duty Digs

episodes.synopsis: Nearby friends led Mary and Chris to pick their house; now there's not enough room for a growing family. It's time to either refurbish or run.
episodes.title: Neighborhood Necessities

episodes.synopsis: Two moms plus two teens equals too many people in one tiny bungalow. One wants to keep it; the other says no way. It's time to fix up or head out.
episodes.title: Privacy Pains

episodes.synopsis: A former farmhouse has charm but lacks amenities, so its modern owners must choose: either a design update or give it up for an urban alternative.
episodes.title: Country Living in the City

episodes.synopsis: They planned to turn a duplex into one big house, but six years and one baby later, nothing's been done. It's time to get to work -- or get moving.
episodes.title: Duplex Dilemma

episodes.synopsis: Something's got to give for Dan and Krista, who live with five growing boys in a poorly laid-out 1,400-square-foot home.
episodes.title: Boy Overload

episodes.synopsis: Desmond and Alice bought the perfect house, but that was ten years and three sons ago, and now they need something bigger.
episodes.title: Builder's Plan Predicament

episodes.synopsis: The 150-year-old Victorian has needed countless repairs since Matt and Kelly bought it. Now, Kelly wants to sell, but Matt holds out hope.
episodes.title: Collapsing Victorian

episodes.synopsis: Sisters Sherry and Julie bought a house together and live on separate floors, but while Sherry loves the arrangement, Julie wants out.
episodes.title: Sister Strife

episodes.synopsis: The added responsibility of home ownership is driving Joe crazy, but wife BJ hopes he'll see its rewards, too.
episodes.title: Missing the Condo Convenience

episodes.synopsis: After a year in their century-old first home, Heidi's more in love with it than ever, while Greg sees new problems everywhere he looks.
episodes.title: A Case of Buyer's Remorse

episodes.synopsis: After eight years in their urban "starter home," Niru is happily settled, but Alok wants to move to the suburbs to be near his family.
episodes.title: Urban Versus Suburban

episodes.synopsis: Oliver and Melissa were outbid on eight houses in a single year before he made the winning offer on their new home -- while Melissa was out of town.
episodes.title: Dingy Downstairs Dungeon

episodes.synopsis: Originally intending to rent out his 100-year-old house, Scott now lives there with his wife and kids, along with plenty of homeowner headaches.
episodes.title: Talk of the Town

episodes.synopsis: Danielle wanted to buy a house from her uncle, even after a series of renters had taken a toll on it. Now, she and Aaron are having second thoughts.
episodes.title: Change of Heart

episodes.synopsis: When financial troubles arise for Jade, she moves back in with her mother, who's two years into a mortgage on a new home.
episodes.title: Mother Daughter Mortgage

episodes.synopsis: Colin and Aline's home was perfect at first, but now their three children are older and the house is full of hockey equipment.
episodes.title: Sport-Centric Lifestyle

episodes.synopsis: Dave doesn't want to leave his rural bachelor home, but Krista wants to make a fresh start in a house without all the "history."
episodes.title: Bachelor Pad Blues

episodes.synopsis: Wendy wants to buy a new house, but Dave thinks a renovation can change the layout that keeps them separated from their epileptic daughter at night.
episodes.title: Praying for a Peaceful Escape

episodes.synopsis: The addition of a child and a parent have proven that Peter and Stephanie's first home is too small, especially when they host big family gatherings.
episodes.title: Ever-Expanding Family Affair
